argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | znvalOLD.z | |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) |
| 2 |  | znvalOLD.s | |- S = ( RSpan ` Z ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zsubrg | |- ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_subrgring | |- ( ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> Z e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- Z e. Ring |
| 6 |  | #P_snssi | |- ( N e. ZZ -> { N } C_ ZZ ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_subrgbas | |- ( ZZ e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> ZZ = ( Base ` Z ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_ax-mp | |- ZZ = ( Base ` Z ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LIdeal ` Z ) = ( LIdeal ` Z ) |
| 10 | 2, 8, 9 | #P_rspcl | |- ( ( Z e. Ring /\ { N } C_ ZZ ) -> ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 6, 10 | #P_sylancr | |- ( N e. ZZ -> ( S ` { N } ) e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) |
